about_the_game:
• Guns and Spells, Partner! Wield a trusty firearm and unleash powerful spells to dominate the battlefield.

  • Knock 'Em Out or Take 'Em Down – Every attack pushes enemies back. Force them out of the arena or deal direct damage to claim victory.

  • Round-Based Action – Compete in intense rounds, with each round presenting new opportunities to upgrade your arsenal.

  • Endless Customization – Choose upgrade cards after each round to unlock new spells, gun attachments, or boost stats like damage, knockback, and speed. Tailor your playstyle to become the ultimate Western Wizard!

  • Chaotic Multiplayer – Battle your friends (or foes) in fast-paced, action-packed arenas full of danger and destruction.

Will you outgun and outcast your opponents to become the last wizard standing? Jump into the fray and show the world why the west is wild!

short_description: Saddle up, spell-slinger! Western Wizards combines the chaotic fun of top-down arena brawlers with the wild west charm of cowboy wizardry. Blast your rivals with bullets and magical mayhem in this high-octane battle where every shot and spell, could send your foes flying out of the arena!
